abstract.para: mod-xslt development is currently hosted on github, www.github.com. This page provides instructions on how to contribute.

article.para: mod-xslt is currently developed using git. For more details on git, read .
Git repositories are hosted on github.com. You can follow the instructions here to access the repository.

Contributions are more than welcome! If you'd like to contribute code, fork the project as usual for github, and send a pull request. Before starting work or doing anything large, it's a good idea to discuss the idea on the mailing list.
